mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_CONCERN, PHONE, MEM_GEN ) VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberConcern}, #{phone}, #{memberGender} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_CONCERN, MEM_PRO, PHONE, LOCATION, STATUS, MEM_GEN, POINT, FILE_PATH, ACCOUNT, INTRO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEM_NAME = #{memberName}, MEM_CONCERN = #{memberConcern}, PHONE = #{phone}, POINT = #{point} WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_JOB, CATEGORY_NO, MEM_NO FROM PROFESSIONAL WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo}
